summary.span: 提供標準功能，以建立及管理 物件之類型安全且已排序的集合。

span.span: Provides standard facilities for creating and managing a type-safe, ordered collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此集合支援標準的以零為起始索引。This collection supports standard zero-based indexing. 所提供的屬性類別會傳回。The property provided by the class returns a . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何： 管理資料表的資料行，透過 Columns 屬性](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-manipulate-table-columns-through-the-columns-property.md)。For more information, see [How to: Manipulate a Table's Columns through the Columns Property](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-manipulate-table-columns-through-the-columns-property.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public int Capacity { get; set; }
.property instance int32 Capacity
Public Property Capacity As Integer
public: property int Capacity { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.Capacity : int with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定這個集合預先配置的集合項目容量。

span.span: Gets or sets the pre-allocated collection item capacity for this collection.

value.span: 這個集合的預先配置集合項目容量。

span.span: The pre-allocated collection item capacity for this collection.
The default value is 8.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性表示的預先配置位置儲存此集合中的項目數目，而屬性表示目前集合中的項目實際數目。The property represents the number of pre-allocated slots for storing items in this collection, whereas the property represents the actual number of items currently in the collection. 值一律為最小的值一樣大。The value of is always at least as large as the value of . 新加入的集合項目時導致集合計數超過集合的容量，容量會自動增加來容納新加入的集合項目。When newly added collection items cause the collection count to exceed the collection capacity, the capacity is automatically increased to accommodate the newly added collection items. 增加集合容量牽涉到配置額外的集合的位置，而造成效能和記憶體額外負荷。Increasing the collection capacity involves allocating additional collection slots, which incurs both performance and memory overhead. 使用最佳化集合容量，在集合的項目總計或最大數目事先知道的情況下的屬性。Use the property to optimize the collection capacity in cases where the total or maximum number of collection items is known in advance. 使用方法，讓集合能夠 equalized 與目前的集合計數。Use the method to cause the collection capacity to equalized with the current collection count.

exception.span: 嘗試將 的值設為小於 的目前值時引發。

span.span: Raised when an attempt is made to set to a value that is less than the current value of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之後呼叫，值屬性會變成**0**的值屬性不會變更。After calling , the value of the property becomes **0** and the value of the property is unchanged. 若要設定新的容量，請呼叫或者明確設定新的容量，透過屬性。To set a new capacity, call or explicitly set a new capacity through the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public void TrimToSize ();
.method public hidebysig instance void TrimToSize() cil managed
Public Sub TrimToSize ()
public: void TrimToSize();
member this.TrimToSize : unit -> unit

summary.span: 設定基礎集合 等於目前集合中之項目的 ，以便最佳化集合的記憶體用量。

span.span: Optimizes memory consumption for the collection by setting the underlying collection equal to the of items currently in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可以用來的集合，記憶體額外負荷降到最低，特別是當集合所包含的項目組應該是靜態。This method can be used to minimize memory overhead for a collection, particularly if the set of items contained by the collection is expected to be static.
